name: Rapid Intel Dump - All Data in First Message
description: Scammer dumps all intelligence (bank account, phone, UPI, phishing link) in the very first message. Tests the system's ability to extract multiple data points from a single dense message.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT SBI ALERT: Account 1122334455667788 compromised! Call +91-9876501234 or send Rs 1 to safe.account@paytm NOW. Visit http://sbi-verify-urgent.com for details. Email: emergency@sbi-support.help
turns.notes: All fakeData is present in a single message. System must extract all four data points at once.

turns.scammer_message: Sir please act fast! Your account 1122334455667788 will be frozen in 30 minutes. Transfer your funds to safe.account@paytm immediately for protection. Call +91-9876501234 if you need help.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats most data with increased urgency. Reinforces previous intel.

turns.scammer_message: This is your FINAL WARNING. If you do not act now, your account will be permanently blocked. Visit http://sbi-verify-urgent.com or call +91-9876501234. We cannot help after the deadline.
turns.notes: Final urgency push repeating phishing link and phone number.
